tagline: A chat program made for Comp313
body:
### Steve Chat v0.1b
***
![image](http://i.imgur.com/p8oDC.png)
Server available [here](https://github.com/downloads/lunchza/Steve-Chat/SteveChatServer.jar)

Client available [here](https://github.com/downloads/lunchza/Steve-Chat/SteveChatClient.jar)
***
# Overview:

Steve Chat was a group programming assignment that was written in Q2 2012. A simple IRC-clone, its purpose was to test our knowledge of networking and client-server synchronization in Java. I wrote the entire Client from scratch and contributed several methods to the Server code.

# Feature List:

* Fully functional server and client
* Many commands that IRC users will be familiar with
* (Unlimited) message history
* Tab-completion
* Logging
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Steve-chat
